br.p: The events listed on this calendar are not all-inclusive. Classroom-based events may not be included in this listing, and pending events are not listed until they are confirmed by the Principal. Should you want details about an event or should you want to know about a pending event not yet listed on this calendar, please call the Main Office.

img.title: Future Ready Schools
img.style: width: 70%; height: auto; margin: 0 auto; display: block;

div.p:
The Old Tappan Public School District exists to foster a community of learners in which each participant’s interests, gifts and talents, dreams, and personal best are explored, cultivated, expressed, and celebrated.
In our schools, we seek to create an environment that is both challenging and nurturing for every learner. In doing so, we embrace our District’s core values of community, curiosity, courage, creativity, and commitment. We believe that, together, we can accomplish amazing things!
